name: Bandit Brawl
description: The core dynamic of Bandit Brawl is destruction. This game takes inspiration from generations of acclaimed fighting games such as Street Fighter, Mortal Kombat, and Super Smash Bros. It preserves classic fighter elements like pixel graphics, side-view perspective, and nostalgic soundtracks, and packages them into a thrilling modern game, providing all-new characters, controls, environments, and levels.
